meanings.sent1: The chironomid hovered near the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a chironomid flying around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The chironomid seemed to be dancing in the air.
meanings.sent4: The chironomid was like a tiny dancer in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering wings of the chironomid caught my eye.

meanings.definition: Larvae of a nonbiting midge fly.
meanings.sent1: The chironomid larvae wriggled in the pond.
meanings.sent2: Fish feed on chironomid larvae in the water.
meanings.sent3: The chironomid larvae were like tiny noodles in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The pond was a nursery for chironomid larvae.
meanings.sent5: The chironomid larvae squirmed under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Pupa of a nonbiting midge fly.
meanings.sent1: The chironomid pupa rested on a leaf.
meanings.sent2: The chironomid pupa was hidden in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The chironomid pupa looked like a tiny sleeping bag.
meanings.sent4: Inside the chironomid pupa, a transformation was taking place.
meanings.sent5: The delicate shell of the chironomid pupa protected its secret.
